settings.cart_below_text: Free shipping. Free returns. Free exchanges.

settings.text: By selecting a few key wardrobe pieces you can craft a personal style with little effort. The Durant Oxfords are a great place to start. They break the mold from a typical cap-toe, but aren’t as elaborate as full wingtips. Broguing opens up the normally conservative Oxford to a world of possibilities. The subtle accents along key areas of the upper distinguish them from the more conservative look, while refraining from full-on party mode. These are the must haves, the eye-catchers. You know, the ones you can mix and match, dress up or dress down and they will always look amazing.

This product is made from full-grain calfskin leather sourced from a Gold-Rated tannery based in Arzignano, Italy. Being the highest level of recognition awarded by the Leather Working Group, a Gold rating signifies the leather manufacturer meets the most stringent criteria and demonstrates a strong commitment to mitigating its environmental impact.

Elevate your style game with block heels, the perfect balance of fashion and function. Their sturdy construction and comfortable design make them an ideal choice for any occasion. Block heels are the epitome of timeless elegance, a must-have for any fashion-conscious individual. Their chunky heel provides support and stability, while their sleek design adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit.

This type of sandal features a buckle that helps to secure the shoe to the foot and can be adjusted to provide a comfortable fit. The buckle may be made of metal or plastic and can come in various shapes and sizes. Sandals with buckles can be made from a variety of materials including leather, synthetic materials, and natural fibers such as cotton or jute.

At Adoro, we create shoes for those who appreciate quality. Our footwear offers a polished, stylish, and refined look that exudes intelligence. We take pride in incorporating subtle yet distinctive details that set our footwear apart from the rest.

settings.subtitle: THE INTERIOR IS AS BEAUTIFUL AS THE EXTERIOR
settings.text: The Vachetta leather lining allows your feet to breathe, regulates temperature and absorbs moisture. Plus it’s super comfortable.

settings.subtitle: SLEEK LOOKING YET COMFORTABLE FOR LONG DAYS OF WEAR
settings.text: These shoes look sleek yet they have ample instep volume. The shape of the toe box is widely regarded for its contemporary look and excellent fit.

settings.subtitle: LEATHER SOLES LOOK LUXURIOUS AND WILL LAST FOR YEARS
settings.text: Leather soles are elegant, reliable and can be easily replaced when the time comes. The heels feature a full SBR rubber cap for added traction.

settings.subtitle: SOLID CONSTRUCTION PROVIDES GREAT BALANCE AND SUPPORT
settings.text: After a few wears the leather lined insoles will take the shape of your foot to create a custom-like footbed which will hold for years.

settings.subtitle: DETAILS DON'T ONLY MATTER, THEY'RE EVERYTHING
settings.text: Details such as hand-cut leather, hand-sanded soles, subtle burnishing and waxing provide a unique character which sets these shoes apart from the rest.

Our products are crafted to order in small batches and shipped directly to you. There’s never unsold inventory, no middlemen and no high markups. All of these savings are passed on to you so you get the best in style, materials and craftsmanship at a fraction of traditional retail prices. Win-win.Shipping: March, 2023.

settings.title: FREE SHIPPING. FREE RETURNS. FREE EXCHANGES.
settings.text: You will never have to pay for shipping in the contiguous US. It’s pretty simple, we want your experience to be risk-free.

settings.title: 60-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
settings.text: If your product is not what you expected just send it back (for free) in unworn condition and we’ll refund 100% of your order.

settings.title: 1-YEAR WARRANTY
settings.text: We craft our products so we know exactly what goes into them. We’re happy to offer you a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects.

settings.heading: HOW ARE THESE PRICES POSSIBLE?
settings.row_content: We manage all aspects of production, from design to shipping. By offering products directly to you, we are able to eliminate costly factors, such as middlemen, retail operations, inventory and high overhead. This gives us complete control over pricing and the savings are passed on to you.

settings.heading: CAN I EXCHANGE OR RETURN THEM?
settings.row_content: Yes! You can return or exchange your unworn items for free anywhere in the contiguous US within 60-days of receipt. If the size isn’t right, we can process an exchange quickly. With each run we produce a small reserve of products for this purpose.

settings.heading: WHERE ARE THESE PRODUCTS MADE?
settings.row_content: All of our products are crafted in Bogotá, Colombia under ethical and fair working conditions. Learn more about our crafthere.

settings.heading: WHAT SIZE SHOULD I ORDER?
settings.row_content: If you have been measured on a Brannock device, that's the size you should order. If you don't know your Brannock size, we recommend you followthis guidefor a personalized size recommendation.
